name: NetMonster
description: NetMonster is an network monitoring app which shows information about mobile networks.  It delivers all the data that your smartphone provides. And even its AD free! Thanks to cell hunters who live all over the world you can download list of cells with their location and use it.  You just got lost? Heres NetMonster! This feature is available only is some countries where lists exist.  And heres what NetMonster can show you: - 2G - CID, LAC, RXL, TA, BSIC, ARFCN, Band + neighbouring cells (CID, LAC, BSIC, RXL, ARFCN) - 3G - CI, RNC, CID, LAC, PSC, RSCP, UARFCN, Band + neighbouring cells (PSC, RSCP, UARFCN) - 4G - CI, eNB, CID, TAC, PCI, RSSI, RSRP, RSRQ, SNR, CQI, TA, EARFCN, Band + neighbouring cells (PCI, RSRP, RSRQ, SNR) - 5G - NCI, TAC, PCI, RSRP, RSRQ, SNR, ARFCN, Band - CDMA - BID, SID, NID, LAT, LON, RSSI, EC/IO, SNR  Availability of shown data depends of your device. If you had any issues or questions feel free to write us at hello@netmonster.app.  NetMonster is based on open-source library NetMonster Core -> https://github.com/mroczis/netmonster-core  Loving being beta tester? Feel free to join -> https://play.google.com/apps/testing/cz.mroczis.netmonster
